alert.note: Alert for Corson; Dewey (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued December 25 at 9:24AM MST until December 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 8 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Corson and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
